text.value: Hi! The demons are attacking the city. Please help us!
We need to defeat them all to retake our home.
You managed to defeat my army... for now.
I'll be back and you'll feel the wrath of hell!
You managed to save the town, nice job!
We have spotted some demonic portals near us... We need to prepare for the next fight.
Make sure to repair your buildings and to train new soldiers.
You can do that by clicking on the hammer on the upper right to assign your villagers' tasks.
Then click on a building to train new units.
The demons are coming! I hope you managed to prepare for the assault.
Good luck friend!
Their chief is coming back! He looks stronger than before too.
This is the final assault, defeat him and we'll be free!
Fail... and we'll be doomed forever.
Mortals... you will repent!
FEEL MY WRATH!
How... how could this happen?
You slayed the demon! Now the town is free forever!
Thanks friend, I knew you were the only one who could do it.
FOOLISH HUMAN, YOU THOUGHT YOU COULD DEFEAT ME?
NOW EVERYONE SHALL BE MY SLAVE... BUT YOU...
YOU'LL DIE!
